description: Windflower (Anemone hybrida 'Honorine Jobert') is an amazing plant species due to its long-lasting blooms and ability to thrive in partial shade. Its bright white petals and yellow centres draw the eye and provide stunning contrast to other garden plants. The flowers are long-lasting, up to 6 weeks in a single season, providing weeks of beauty and charm. The seeds of the windflower are easy to grow and can be planted in partial shade, making it the perfect addition to a shaded border or garden. The windflower is sure to bring beauty and elegance to any garden!
